Sentencas: Oxygen electrocatalysis plays a critical role in the efficiency of important energy conversion and storage systems.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: While many efforts have focused on designing efficient electrocatalysts for these processes, optimal catalysts that are inexpensive, active, selective, and stable are still being searched.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: Nonstoichiometric, mixed-metal oxides present a promising group of electrocatalysts for these processes due to the versatility of the surface composition and fast oxygen conducting properties.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: Herein, we demonstrate, using a combination of theoretical and experimental studies, the ability to develop design principles that can be used to engineer oxygen electrocatalysis activity of layered, mixed ionic-electronic conducting Ruddlesden-Popper (R-P) oxides.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: We show that a density function theory (DFT) derived descriptor, O-2 binding energy on a surface oxygen vacancy, can be effective in identifying efficient R-P oxide structures for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR).
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: Using a controlled synthesis method, well-defined nanostructures of R-P oxides are obtained, which along with thermochemical and electrochemical activity studies are used to validate the design principles.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: This has led to the identification of a highly active ORR electrocatalyst, nanostructured Co-doped lanthanum nickelate oxide, which when incorporated in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes significantly enhances the performance at intermediate temperatures (similar to 550 degrees C), while maintaining long-term stability.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides

Sentencas: The reported findings demonstrate the effectiveness of the developed design principles to engineer mixed ionic-electronic conducting oxides for efficient oxygen electrocatalysis, and the potential of nanostructured Co-doped lanthanum nickelate oxides as promising catalysts for oxygen electrocatalysis.
Titulo: Efficient Oxygen Electrocatalysis by Nanostructured Mixed-Metal Oxides
